snippet.title: MiKe Adventures: 'Round The World - SAGE 2021 Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Attending SAGE 2021, the indie game MiKe Adventures: 'Round The World is back and better than ever before!

With unique aesthetics and catchy music, fun to play through platforming levels and more, this videogame releases it's first demo after a long time in August 2021.

MiKe Adventures: 'Round The World is a multiple-genre game starring a teenager with water-altering powers visiting the WonderWorld, a "floating park whose body rests on the mysterious floating island above the sea". In this place he meets the Axolotl TV, the park's mascot who doesn't let him visit the Axolotl Central Prak unless he recovers 30 lost tickets from visitors all 'round the world. Marketable pun intended.

#indiegame #sage2021 #trailer
